text: â€˜Arau smarana karaa, ada jatira (dhbansara) pichata te'om tomalokaka (tomalokara agara lokasakalara) sthalabhisikta karaiche, arau te'om tomalokaka prthiraita enekai pratisthita karaiche ye, tomaloke samatala bhumita prasada nirmana karaiba paraa arau pahara kati basagrha taiyara karaiba paraa. Gatike tomaloke allahara anugraha smarana karaa arau prthiraita biparyaya srsti karai nuphuraibaâ€™
